Data Seal Making UELMA compliance trivial

Data Seal is free, open source software that allows data published by governments to be authenticated by end users with a simple, drag-and-drop interface. It was created for the purpose of helping governments to comply with the Uniform Electronic Legal Materials Act.

Data Seal is available on GitHub.

Vendors

Paid Data Seal hosting is available from Silicon Valley Software Group.
